source.interface:
* This interface enables to process any parameterizable object. $Id: Parameterizable.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 3.0
<method name="getParametersNames" type="Collection" startLine="29" endLine="33" />
* Get the names of the supported parameters. parameters names #isSupported(String)
* Check if a parameter is supported. *
Supported parameters are those listed by {@link #getParametersNames()}. name parameter name to check true if the parameter is supported #getParametersNames()
